OM_Astarion_COM.synopsis: COM moment with the Blood Merchant within Moonrise Towers

OM_Astarion_COM_60.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_60.text: I read about your kind for so many years, but never thought I'd find one in real life. And to find such a fine specimen...

OM_Astarion_COM_110.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_110.text: I'd like to offer my services, if you're willing?

OM_Astarion_COM_36.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_36.text: Put plainly - I'd like your blood. A vial of True Soul's blood, specifically.
OM_Astarion_COM_36.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - we're getting on to the topic she cares most about. States her strange request plainly.

OM_Astarion_COM_83.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_83.text: What does a 'trader in blood' do exactly?

OM_Astarion_COM_59.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_59.text: Why are you interested in my pale friend?

OM_Astarion_COM_10.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_10.text: Please, you think someone in my line of work wouldn't recognise a vampire spawn when they see one?

OM_Astarion_COM_15.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_15.text: I trade in blood and the potions that can be wrung from it. I'm more than happy to make you one, if you'd honour me with your blood.

OM_Astarion_COM_112.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_112.text: With one drop, I can brew a rather potent potion for you. The rest, I keep for myself.
OM_Astarion_COM_112.context: NodeContext: Pleasant - this is of course a perfectly normal thing to offer

OM_Astarion_COM_51.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_51.text: What kind of potion is this, exactly?

OM_Astarion_COM_37.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_37.text: No idea! But it will be unique to you - your blood essence and the Absolute's blessing intertwined.
OM_Astarion_COM_37.context: NodeContext: Cheerful and excited - she's genuinely curious to see what our blood will do

OM_Astarion_COM_50.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_50.text: We can learn exactly what that means together, hm?

OM_Astarion_COM_97.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_97.text: And what exactly will you do with the blood you keep?

OM_Astarion_COM_23.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_23.text: Research, naturally. A little experimentation, perhaps - I have an innate curiosity for all things sanguine.

OM_Astarion_COM_3.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_3.text: Just a little prick and it's all over. Close your eyes.

OM_Astarion_COM_70.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_70.text: A little pain for a lot of gold. And...
OM_Astarion_COM_70.context: NodeContext: The 'And...' is leading to her giving us an additional item

OM_Astarion_COM_86.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_86.text: There we are. All of your very best traits in a bottle. Use it well!

OM_Astarion_COM_108.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_108.text: Although perhaps there's one more thing we could discuss: your friend.
OM_Astarion_COM_108.context: CinematicNodeContext: She turns to Astrion, a big flirtatious grin on her face

OM_Astarion_COM_45.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_45.text: He's a vampire, no? Or one of their spawn, at least.

OM_Astarion_COM_27.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_27.text: Although perhaps there's one more thing we could discuss: your vampiric friend.
OM_Astarion_COM_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: She turns to Astrion, a big flirtatious grin on her face

OM_Astarion_COM_38.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_38.text: Don't worry, we're all friends under the Absolute. I won't bite.

OM_Astarion_COM_46.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_46.text: Oh I'd prefer if you did.

OM_Astarion_COM_7.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_7.text: I assume he belongs to you?
OM_Astarion_COM_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns to the player

OM_Astarion_COM_76.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_76.text: Excuse me? He's his own person.

OM_Astarion_COM_48.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_48.text: I'm sure he really believes that. How utterly adorable.

OM_Astarion_COM_100.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_100.text: Do you have a name, spawn?
OM_Astarion_COM_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns back to Astarion

OM_Astarion_COM_49.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_49.context: InternalNodeContext: cut off before he can finish speaking

OM_Astarion_COM_26.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_26.text: Good. Now, Astarion, I've dreamt of being bitten by a vampire since I was a young girl.

OM_Astarion_COM_69.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_69.text: I'm sorry? You want to be bitten?

OM_Astarion_COM_109.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_109.text: To feel your life's blood slipping away? To dance on the edge between life and death? Yes, I want it.

OM_Astarion_COM_43.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_43.text: I'll even compensate you - a potion of legendary power that forever increases the strength of the one who consumes it.

OM_Astarion_COM_52.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_52.text: It's not for sale, but it's yours if you bite me.

OM_Astarion_COM_88.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_88.text: Excuse me? This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity and you're squandering it.

OM_Astarion_COM_65.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_65.text: Can't you talk some sense into your obstinate charge?
OM_Astarion_COM_65.context: NodeContext: Start with a groan/grunt of frustration

OM_Astarion_COM_66.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_66.text: He said no. There's nothing more to discuss.

OM_Astarion_COM_105.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_105.text: I am surprised, Astarion. I thought you'd jump at a chance like this.

OM_Astarion_COM_57.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_57.text: Just bite her - the potion sounds useful.

OM_Astarion_COM_16.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_16.text: I'm sorry, but could you excuse us a moment?
OM_Astarion_COM_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Goes into a huddle with the player

OM_Astarion_COM_102.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_102.text: Are you actually asking me to do this? Trading me for some potion?

OM_Astarion_COM_71.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_71.text: Because there's something wrong with her blood. I can smell it from here - it's rank.

OM_Astarion_COM_28.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_28.text: What do you mean? What's wrong with her blood?

OM_Astarion_COM_14.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_14.text: I can't say, it just smells wrong. Unnatural.

OM_Astarion_COM_2.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_2.text: Drinking it wouldn't kill me, but it would not be pleasant.

OM_Astarion_COM_104.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_104.text: I don't have all day, True Soul.
OM_Astarion_COM_104.context: NodeContext: The player has been in a huddle talking to their companion, but Araj is losing patience

OM_Astarion_COM_41.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_41.text: Don't do anything you don't want to.

OM_Astarion_COM_96.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_96.text: It's still a no, I'm afraid.

OM_Astarion_COM_64.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_64.text: It's up to you, but we could really use that potion.

OM_Astarion_COM_32.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_32.text: Just suck it up and bite her already.

OM_Astarion_COM_9.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_9.text: Darling, I've had a sudden change of heart!

OM_Astarion_COM_62.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_62.text: After all, who could resist such a delectable neck?

OM_Astarion_COM_101.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_101.context: NodeContext: About to bite the drow

OM_Astarion_COM_40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion bites into her neck, she is very clearly enjoying it. To Astarion the blood tastes foul, though.

OM_Astarion_COM_77.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Being bittenNodeContext: Being bitten by a vampire, having an AMAZING experience

OM_Astarion_COM_54.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overcome by the wretched taste of her blood, Astarion breaks off his bite, turns away from Araj, and vomits up the blood he was drinking.

OM_Astarion_COM_81.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rubbing her neck where Astarion bit herNodeContext: Rubbing her neck where Astarion bit her

OM_Astarion_COM_61.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Recovering from retchingNodeContext: Recovering from retching

OM_Astarion_COM_6.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_6.text: I feel exquisite though - so here's my part of the bargain.

OM_Astarion_COM_63.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_63.text: I hope you find it as satisfying as I found this.

OM_Astarion_COM_8.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_8.text: It was everything I imagined. And then more. I'll be able to put this to good use.

OM_Astarion_COM_92.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_92.text: A potion that powerful could change our fates. Isn't that worth a bad taste in your mouth?

OM_Astarion_COM_85.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_85.text: I... I suppose you have a point.

OM_Astarion_COM_87.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_87.text: This is your choice - do what you want.

OM_Astarion_COM_31.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_31.text: Don't be dramatic, it's just a bite. One nip and you're done.

OM_Astarion_COM_30.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_30.text: Easy for you to say, you won't have to taste whatever sludge is in those veins.

OM_Astarion_COM_56.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_56.text: Her house, Oblodra, was infamous for experimenting with mind flayers. Could her blood be tainted somehow?

OM_Astarion_COM_68.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_68.text: That would explain the stench, yes.

OM_Astarion_COM_78.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_78.text: I already have enough illithid filth in my head - I don't want it in my stomach as well.

OM_Astarion_COM_111.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_111.text: He does what I tell him, if that's what you mean.

OM_Astarion_COM_113.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_113.context: InternalNodeContext: in a romance with Astarion

OM_Astarion_COM_58.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_58.text: Well, I hope you don't mind sharing him for just a minute.

OM_Astarion_COM_99.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_99.text: Ah, well... if you don't mind me saying, you don't look entirely well.
OM_Astarion_COM_99.context: NodeContext: We've agreed to let her draw blood, but our health is too low. She's trying to tell us we look terrible, but politely

OM_Astarion_COM_91.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_91.text: Rest and return. I'll feel better buying your blood when I know you can actually spare it.

OM_Astarion_COM_55.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_55.text: I'm here should you change your mind.

OM_Astarion_COM_11.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_11.text: I just want to see what you have in stock for now.

OM_Astarion_COM_44.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_44.text: I never thought I'd see one in real life... I read about your kind for so many years, but you are a finer specimen than any bestiary could describe.
OM_Astarion_COM_44.context: InternalNodeContext: Astarion-Companion is the 2nd speaker, Player's Avatar is the 3rd speaker.

OM_Astarion_COM_72.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_72.text: You're really a vampire? At least one of their spawn...

OM_Astarion_COM_25.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_25.text: And he's yours to command... My envy is palpable.

OM_Astarion_COM_39.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_39.text: Just a little prick and it's all over. Close your eyes.

OM_Astarion_COM_90.speaker: Araj Oblodra
OM_Astarion_COM_90.text: Araj Oblodra, trader in blood and the sanguineous arts. It is a pleasure to stand before a True Soul. And your pale companion.
OM_Astarion_COM_90.context: InternalNodeContext: Astarion-Companion is the 2nd speaker, Player's Avatar is the 3rd speaker.NodeContext: With a bow. (Araj Oblodra = a-RADJ o-BLOD-ruh)
